title: maven-surefire-plugin file encoding works only from command line
body:
i am using maven 3.3.9 and i am using maven-surefire-plugin to solve the issue of inserting arabic data in the database from import.sql hibernate file for demo data as follows:

            <plugin>
               <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
               <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
               <version>2.20</version>
               <configuration>
                  <argLine>-Dfile.encoding=UTF8</argLine>
               </configuration>
            </plugin>

the plugin works fine when i build the project from command line (the arabic data in the sql file gets inserted in the database with correct encoding), but when i build from eclipse, the plugin doesn't work as expected (the arabic data gets inserted in the database with corrupt encoding)

the original post is here: springboot import.sql encoding issue

please advise how to fix this issue.
